isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WHEELS, RIMS AND TIRES - TIRE CARE - SERVICE LOAD AND INFLATION CHARTS

table.title: SERVICE LOAD AND INFLATION CHART (NOT MICHELIN) (For Trucks, Buses and Trailers in Normal Highway Service)

entry.para: TIRE LOAD LIMITS (POUNDS) AT VARIOUS COLD INFLATION PRESSURES (PSI)
Letters listed with loads designate the maximum load range for that load range. Do not exceed rim load and/or inflation limits
